text: Warren is a city in and the county seat of Trumbull County, Ohio, United States. The city is located in northeastern Ohio, approximately northwest of Youngstown and west of the Pennsylvania state line. The population was 39,201 at the 2020 census. Warren is part of the Youngstown-Warren, OH Metropolitan Statistical Area. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Warren's official website Category:Cities in Ohio Category:County seats in Ohio
title: Warren, Ohio
